## eDNA Survey

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# generate token
token = arcgisutils::auth_client()

# feature server url
edna_url='https://services2.arcgis.com/C8EMgrsFcRFL6LrL/arcgis/rest/services/eDNA_Strata/FeatureServer'

# metadata
edna_meta = arcgisutils::fetch_layer_metadata(url = edna_url, token = token)
```

### Spatial Extent

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# get layer bounding box
edna_bb = data.frame(
  x = c(edna_meta$fullExtent$xmin, edna_meta$fullExtent$xmax), 
  y = c(edna_meta$fullExtent$ymin, edna_meta$fullExtent$ymax)) |>
  sf::st_as_sf(coords = c('x', 'y'), crs = edna_meta$fullExtent$spatialReference$latestWkid) |>
  sf::st_bbox() |>
  sf::st_as_sfc() |>
  sf::st_transform(4326)
  
# leaflet map
leaflet::leaflet() |>
  leaflet::addTiles() |>
  leaflet::addPolygons(data = edna_bb)
```

### Fields

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
# layers 
edna_layers = edna_meta$layers

# loop over layers
edna_fields = purrr::map(.x = 1:nrow(edna_layers ), .f = function(.x) {
  
  # open layer
  edna_layer = arcgislayers::arc_open(url = paste0(edna_url, '/', edna_layers$id[.x]), token = token)
  
  # get metadata for layer
  edna_layer_meta = arcgisutils::fetch_layer_metadata(url = paste0(edna_url, '/', edna_layers$id[.x]), token = token)
  
  # layer description
  layer_desc =  edna_layer_meta$description
  layer_desc = gsub("\\n", '', layer_desc)
  
  # get fields
  edna_fields = arcgislayers::list_fields(edna_layer) |>
    dplyr::select(name, alias, description, actualType) |>
    dplyr::rename(dataType = actualType)
  
  # format description
  edna_fields = edna_fields |>
    dplyr::mutate(description = gsub(':|\\"', '', stringr::str_extract(description, ':\\s*([^,]+)'))) |>
    dplyr::filter(!name %in% c('Shape__Area', 'Shape__Length'))
  
  # output
  cat('\n####', edna_layers$name[.x], '\n')
  cat('<em>Description</em><br>')
  cat(layer_desc, '\n')
    print(knitr::kable(edna_fields))
  cat('\n')

})

```
